subject: NE
title: Introduction to Nanomaterials Health Risks
description: Nanomaterial impacts on worker, consumer, and environmental health. Engineered nanomaterials and ultrafines. Chemical risk assessment. Nanomaterial exposure characterization. Introductory nanotoxicology. Environmental chemical impacts, transport, and bio-accumulation. Human risks, and benefits. Introductory epidemiology, including study design, strength of association, bias, confounding and causal inference. [Offered: W]
